participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and compassionate, enjoys helping others and thrives in social situations.
participant_1.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i am a professional wrestler. i enjoy being around people. in my spare time i do volunteer work.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Creative and curious, loves engaging with different cultures and expressing herself through music.
participant_2.background: i am a musician. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.

content.text: Nice to see you too. What is your profession?
